location: Near elevated highway/expressway in Zhongshan District
notes: Modern high-rise building (9F) with contemporary architecture and secured parking entrance. Interior is brand new/unfurnished with polished tile floors, clean white walls, and multiple rooms visible. Being on the top floor provides excellent city views but proximity to elevated highway may cause noise. Unit is spacious at 33 ping with good natural light from large windows. No obvious baby safety hazards visible in empty unit, but balcony access should be verified.
